metadata.title: CVE-2023-23918 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in Node.js <19.6.1, <18.14.1,<16.19.1 and <14.21.3 that made it possible to bypass the experimentalPermissions (https://nodejs.org/api/permissions.html) feature in Node.jsand access non authorized modules by using process.mainModule.require().This only affects users who had enabled the experimental permissions optionwith --experimental-policy.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
